mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeboard (bno, title, writer, content) VALUES(freeboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT brn.board_bno, brn.cnt AS boardLikeCnt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, bcnt.* FROM ( SELECT count(*) AS cnt, board_bno FROM board_like bl GROUP BY board_bno ORDER BY cnt DESC ) bcnt ) brn WHERE rn <= 4
SELECT u.profile_color, b.board_bno, b.user_id, content FROM users u INNER JOIN board b ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE board_bno = #{boardBno}
